Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to requiring the establishment of utility customer arrears reporting
Summary: Relates to requiring the establishment of utility customer arrears reporting; requires utilities to report to the public service commission on customers who are in arrears.
LawCode: Add ยง28, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring the establishment of utility customer arrears reporting
